scripts.build: del-cli dist && tsc -d --emitDeclarationOnly --resolveJsonModule --declarationDir dist --lib DOM src/index.ts && mv dist/src/ dist/types && rollup -c
scripts.generate-test-images: tsc --downlevelIteration --esModuleInterop --outDir tmp src/__tests__/util/generateTestImagesScript.ts && node tmp/__tests__/util/generateTestImagesScript.js; del-cli tmp; npm run format
scripts.build-demo: del-cli demo && parcel build src/__demo__/index.html --out-dir demo --public-url . --no-minify --no-source-maps
